          <title>
            <string language="en-US">Investigating Numbers</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">This flipchart introduces students to the hundreds chart. Students work interactively with the board while becoming comfortable counting with the hundreds chart.</string>
